title: Cosmic Canvas.
content: Welcome to Cosmic Canvas, your ultimate destination for exploring the mysteries of deep space. Our website features a stunning abstract image of a deep space object as its main wallpaper, which sets the perfect tone for our content. We offer a wide range of articles, images, and videos that cover various topics related to astronomy, astrophysics, and cosmology. Whether you are a seasoned astronomer or just starting to explore the wonders of the universe, you will find something of interest on our website. Join us on this cosmic journey and discover the beauty and complexity of the universe we live in! ðŸš€ðŸŒŒ

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a deep space object, such as a black hole or pulsar, with swirling colors and patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
